artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Wacoal; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Multi colored 2.75" squares spaced 3.25" apart. Squares have either thin horiz. stripes or rows of small variously spaced vert. rectangles. Polka dot background. Pattern rpt. 36". Various shades from bright to light red, blue, purple, pink on midnight blue field. Midnight Blue
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Larsen Design Studio
title: Polka
